about_the_game:
PROJECT: OBSCURION is an immersive spot the difference horror game that challenges your perception and tests your limits. Dive into a world where secrets and unexplained phenomena converge, blurring the boundaries of reality.

As a "Cam-Agent" of a secret government organization, it's your duty to explore the unknown. Unusual levels of radiation have been detected at various locations in the city, accompanied by strange events. Monitor these locations using cameras and mark anything that appears unnatural. Pay attention to every detail and don't let the anomalies go unnoticed for too long.

Your mission is of utmost importance and is held under strict confidentiality. You're alone in a remote bunker, with no one to help if things go wrong. Your observation skills, sharp intellect, and bravery will be put to the test as you venture into the unknown to uncover the truth.
Are you ready to take on the challenge of "PROJECT: OBSCURION" and investigate the unexplained?

The fate lies in your hands. Stay alert and keep your eyes wide open!


Skip through the different cameras and look for things like:

  • Objects that change
  • Objects that disappear or appear
  • Moving doors
  • Appearances of people and ghosts
  • Malfunctions of electrical devices


The game offers a large number of detailed maps, and some of them have multiple versions to ensure you discover something new each time.

Here are some of the planned maps:

  • Police Station
  • City Opera House
  • Office Building
  • Subway Station
  • Various Houses


  • Movable cameras
  • A custom game mode with many configuration options
  • Large selection of detailed maps
  • Many different events
  • Random anomalies
  • Peaceful mode without jumpscares

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game that contains blood and other horror related content.
